Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Vacchagottasaṃyutta » 12.1 Vacchagottavagga
12.1.41--45 Rūpaasamapekkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
Vacchagottasaṃyutta
Vacchagottavagga
Rūpaasamapekkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
647--651.
1266Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Rūpe kho, vaccha, asamapekkhaṇā…pe…  viññāṇe kho, vaccha, asamapekkhaṇā…pe… . Pañcacattālīsamaṃ.
